data.message: It's redundant and a waste of time to have to download and use 2 different apps just to message someone on FB.  I have 2 messages that I have to use FB Messenger to read.  That is beyond stupid.

replies.message: Hey Andrew. We want to make everyday messaging with the most important people in your life fast, reliable, useful and fun, and we're confident Messenger is the way to do that. We hope you’ll try it and let us know what you think. Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1uFk239 -Hailey

I had it, but I turned off notifications because they're annoying.  More annoying is being asked to turn them on EVERY TIME I open the app.  I deleted the app because it's annoying.  Your reply is appreciated, but the fact remains FBM just plain sucks.

To Facebook.......please get off of my notification page. I am getting everyone's messages to and from you. I'm ready to get off of Facebook. I have sent you several messages....please fix this problem
Have you seen what messenger takes from your phone ? It's like having the cia on your phone stalking you
Just because you want to do it, doesn't mean everyone else wants to.
